column1: Option 4: Towns and refined villages of population 500+
A: Restrict development in CCMA according to CRPG recommendations
A: Apply the optional lower threshold at 5 units in "Rural Areas"
B: Continue considering low impact dwellings under the same framework as conventional dwellings
B: Apply the identified key employment sites
B: Provide support for renewable energy and heat development and identify areas for large scale renewable energy development
